title: 2025 President Federation Cup final gets date , venue
body_text:
Sport
2025 President Federation Cup final gets date, venue
The Nigeria Football Federation, NFF, have confirmed the Mobolaji Johnson Arena, Onikan, Lagos as the venue for the 2025 President Federation Cup.
The final of the Cup competition will be played on Saturday, June 28, 2025.
The NFF disclosed this in a press release on Monday.
Nigeria Premier Football League, NPFL, side, Kwara United will lock horns with Nigeria National League, NNL, side, Abakaliki FC in the final of the competition.
Defending Champions, Rivers Angels will tackle Nasarawa Amazons in the womenâ€™s final at the same venue.
DAILY POST recalls that El-Kanemi Warriors won the competition last year.
The winner of the competition will play in the CAF Confederation Cup next season.
